titleStmt.title: The peace of Jerusalem A sermon preac'd before the right honourable the Lord Mayor and aldermen of the City of London. At S Paul's Cathedral, July 31. 1698. By R. Wykes chaplain to the right honourable John Lord Cartaret, and lecturer of St. Mildred Poultrey, London.
titleStmt.author: Wykes, R.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Parkhurst at the Bible and Three Corwns at the lower end of Cheapside, near Mercers-Chapel,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preach'd before the Lord Mayor, July 31. 1698.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: the lower end of Cheapside, near Mercers-Chapel
